description:
A 4 hour hike that includes all sort of trail activities:
Steep climb, steep decline and easy walks.
It passes wooded areas, open mountain areas, sea shore, power line roads and other trails.  It offers wonderful view of Vancouver, the North Shore mountains and the Indian Arm.
A very good way to spend a beautiful half day in Vancouver.
directions: Start at North Rd. in Burnaby, off Broadway.
title: Burnaby Mtn - Hiking Loop
